about_us_content:
Al-Thawra Yemeni Magazine is an official Yemeni newspaper founded in 1962, and is one of the oldest and most prestigious newspapers in the Republic of Yemen. The magazine is published by the Yemeni Ministry of Information and aims to convey local, Arab and international news and events with objectivity and credibility.

The magazine covers various fields including politics, economy, culture and sports, and seeks to provide balanced media content that serves the Yemeni community and reflects its issues and interests. It also seeks to keep pace with technological developments by providing an interactive digital version that allows readers to access content anytime, anywhere.

Al-Thawra Yemeni Magazine is the voice of the Yemeni people and a free platform for expressing opinions and ideas, and is committed to high international journalistic professional standards in presenting news and analysis.
privacy_policy_intro:
At althawrah, we give high priority to the privacy of our visitors. This document contains the types of information collected and recorded by althawrah and how it is used.

If you have additional questions or need more information about our privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact us.
privacy_policy_scope: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in althawrah. This policy does not apply to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
consent_content: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
info_we_collect_content:
The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
how_we_use_content:
We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

• Provide, operate, and maintain our website
• Improve, personalize, and expand our website
• Understand and analyze how you use our website
• Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
• Communicate with you for customer service and to provide you with updates and other information
• Send you emails
• Find and prevent fraud
children_info_content:
Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

althawrah does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
